text.name: info1
text.text: Amiga 3000, or A3000, is a personal computer released by Commodore in June 1990. It features improved processing speed, improved graphics rendering, and a new revision of the operating system. It is the successor to the Amiga 2000.

text.name: info1

text.text: Amiga 3000, oder A3000, ist ein Personal Computer, der von Commodore im Juni 1990 herausgebracht wurde.
